00011 #ifdef RUDIMENTS_HAS_SSL
00012         #include <openssl/ssl.h>
00013 #endif
00014 
00015 #ifdef RUDIMENTS_HAVE_SYS_SOCKET_H
00016         // IRIX appears to need this but OpenBSD can't
00017         // find select() if it's still defined later
00018         #ifndef _XOPEN_SOURCE
00019                 #define _XOPEN_SOURCE
00020                 #define UN_XOPEN_SOURCE
00021         #endif
00022         #include <sys/socket.h>
00023         #ifdef UN_XOPEN_SOURCE
00024                 #undef _XOPEN_SOURCE
00025         #endif
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 // so STDIN_FILENO, STDOUT_FILENO, STDERR_FILENO will be defined if they need
00029 // to be used by the calling program...
00030 #ifdef RUDIMENTS_HAVE_UNISTD_H
00031         #include <unistd.h>
00032 #endif
00033 #include <stdio.h>
